item.title: Heracles Mad by Euripides
item.description: Play by Euripides. It is in GB Volume 5. Newsletter post: www.readgreatbooks.info/p/great-books-ep-88-euripides-hecuba People in the play: Amphitryon, Megara, Lycus, Heracles, Iris, Madness, Messenger, Chorus of Old Men of Thebes, Theseus Heracles Mad Metadata Author: Euripides Full Title: Heracles Mad Category:articles URL: readwise.io/reader/document_raw_content/234196780 Highlights As for friends, some I see are insincere; while others, who are staunch, have no power to help us further.
